title: Research data quality: Glob-result, Task-result, WebFetch-result
description: Analyze samples of Glob-result, Task-result, WebFetch-result. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Glob-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Glob-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Glob-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (Task-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Task-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (Task-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (WebFetch-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'WebFetch-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (WebFetch-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
